title: Seeing the Kaaba in a dream Interpretation of the Kaaba in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Kaaba and TawafSeeing the Kaaba in a dream for a girlSeeing the Kaaba in an unmarried woman’s dreamInterpretation of a dream about the Holy Kaaba for a married womanSeeing the Kaaba in a dream for a pregnant womanSeeing the Kaaba in a dream and praying thereInterpretation of seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a girlInterpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba and touching itIt stipulates justice and equality; Because Muslims in it are equal in worship, dress, steps of Hajj, Sunnah, and the Qur’an, and it refers to Paradise because it is the abode of forgiveness from which the pilgrim returns. His mother also gave birth to him, forgiving his sins, even though he was like sea foam. Seeing the Kaaba in general is good news for one who intends good and a warning against ignorance or carrying evil in his heart. When we see the Kaaba in a dream that it has become the dreamer’s home, this indicates that people are searching for it in their need or for their honor and proximity, and seeing the Kaaba may indicate that they gathered with him from In order to increase the position he gains or learn that people benefit from what he teaches them or in exchange for a service they request from his daughter or sister. A pure and high-level marriage is maintained, but if the dreamer is a slave, this indicates liberation from his master because he saw him entering the Kaaba, the house of God, which God saved from the hands of oppressed peoples. And whoever sees that it is around the Kaaba: If he looks at it or performs one of its rituals, this indicates that he He will serve a ruler, a scholar, his elderly father or mother, an ascetic, his wife with whom he will be rented, or a master who will serve him. – The difficulty, fairness and toil of earning the reward of any of them. If he is an unbeliever, he will be sincere and pray and make amends, and if he is far from the religion and does not know, he will return to it, and if the dreamer is disobedient to his parents, God will guide him and return to him. The service and satisfaction of his parents, and if he is in trouble or sick and in need in this world, he may enter the home or place of the ruler or jurist and decide on his case, unless he actually fears this matter. His life is safe from whatever he wants. Whoever is sick: If he is sick, then his entry into the Kaaba indicates his death with repentance and victory, and his victory will be greater if he sees people carrying him among the silent people, whether he knows them or not. Likewise, is he keen on worship or not taking sides in it? Seeing the Kaaba in the wrong place: Whoever sees the Kaaba in the wrong place or in the wrong place, if it is empty of flutes around it, this means that he is in a hurry, and if he is waiting for the wedding, this indicates. That the wedding will take place. After a long wait, and if he enters the Kaaba while he is in the process of getting married and waiting for a long time, he will guide him well. Place: He enters the house of a righteous girl after the hardships she suffers from. Whoever sees the Kaaba in the wrong place and abandons prayer or abandons worship, it is a warning to him to go to the Qiblah, pray, and return. To the religion and follow it, or whoever has not performed the Hajj obligation and sees the Kaaba in a place different from its place, this indicates that he is reminded of his indifference and that he should hasten to perform the Hajj, which is better for him than God. Or a well-known imam who came from Hajj to bring justice to them, and he may be a sultan, a ruler, or a just and beloved person who leaves his home due to an accident, an order issued to him, or the death of a person or person. The people quarreled with him and left

title: Interpretation of a dream about meat in a dream, cooked and raw, for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Meat in a dream: There are many who see meat cooked and others raw, and whoever eats it and others sells it or gives it away for free, and each of them has its own interpretation, which may be bad or good, and this is what we learn according to the interpretation of dreams by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of the vision: Meat in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, with Different places where meat is seen, Ibn Sirin says: It can generally indicate illness or pain to the beholder, especially if the meat is still raw. He said that if you are buying meat in a dream, this is a sign of illness or the occurrence of disasters. Likewise, if you are eating Meat, this act shows bad omens to the fortuneteller and the gossip that results from it. However, if the meat you see is salted, this indicates the end of the affliction that you suffered from. In other places, salted meat may indicate livelihood and money that belongs to the fortuneteller. Ibn explained In his interpretation, Sirin says that whoever sees some meat, this is a sign of a misfortune that may befall one of the dreamer’s relatives. The same applies if the meat is from a quarter. That is, in the area between the chest and the neck after the upper thigh, and this indicates a misfortune that will befall a woman or girl who is a relative of the fortuneteller. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing food in a dream Interpretation of meat in a dream Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi believes that it is important to determine whether what you see in a dream is It is raw or cooked meat. Eating raw meat indicates the distress and worry that the fortuneteller is suffering from. But if you eat and eat raw meat, it is clear that this is good. Rather, it may be useful to the viewer. What if you eat meat in a dream? Are you forbidden? This is an indication that you are enjoying the forbidden money that has entered your home. Indeed, eating the meat of a forbidden animal such as pig indicates immorality. If the meat you see is of unknown origin, this is a sign of disorder. , which is confirmed by seeing blood coming out of the meat. The interpretation of seeing cooked meat in the dreams of Ibn Sirin is that whoever eats meat after it is cooked while it is cooked, it is of nourishment and goodness. Some also believe that if the meat is cooked and it tastes delicious, then this is a sign of health or narrow solutions to adversities and problems. Which you may suffer from.In addition, the level of doneness of the meat may vary in meaning. If it is fully cooked, it means that the dream will come true soon. If the meat is not fully cooked, this may indicate that there is a problem in meeting the dreamer's desire and effort. Also, if you find that the meat is cooked in broth, this indicates an extensive diet that the fortuneteller will enjoy Even after a long time. If you see meat cooked with rice, this indicates a large diet that the dreamer receives from a strong man. But if the meat is cooked with vegetables, this is a sign of money and joy for the fortuneteller. Distributing Meat in a Dream If the dreamer sees that he is distributing meat to the poor, this means It indicates the necessity of giving zakat, which removes the disaster from you. If the meat you distribute is to people you do not know, then this is an urgency for repentance and charity, and the necessity of paying zakat on money. It is stated in the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen that whoever distributes meat in a dream can

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a one-eyed person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of one eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin It is worth noting that the eye is considered the most important organ in the human body and this is the blessing that God Almighty gave to man, especially through the world around us that sees us, and of course seeing the eye in a dream is one of the visions that carries with it many interpretations, meanings and interpretations, and they vary. Depending on the viewer of this dream and the viewer in the dream, and in this context we will explain the interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin about seeing one-eyed man in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of seeing one-eyed man in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the visions that are considered terrifying for individuals, especially since one-eyed person is someone who has lost an eye, and seeing him in a dream has many From the various interpretations and explanations, here we will learn about them. The interpretation of the dream of seeing one-eyed man in a dream by Ibn Sirin is also: According to the scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing a person with one eye is evidence of the believer’s sincerity and faith. Then whoever commits sins and misdeeds sees himself with one eye in a dream. This dream is an indication. On his repeated sins. Also, this dream could be a sign that the dreamer has suffered fatigue or bad luck for himself, his wife, or his child, or it could be a sign of losing blessings. As it is known that the eye is a blessing from God Almighty to the servants. Seeing Its destruction is a sign of the destruction of blessings. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a piggy bank in a dream from the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of seeing the one-eyed Antichrist in a dream, as this character is mentioned in verses of the Holy Qur’an, and his appearance in a dream is among the visions that include many different interpretations and explanations, and in this The context is that we will get to know ourselves. The interpretation of seeing the one-eyed Antichrist in a dream is also: If an unmarried girl sees the Antichrist in a dream, she wants to see him or if she has already seen him. This means that there is someone who wants to control this girl’s life. Also, She should avoid this because of the strength of her personality and her approach to life. Also, seeing the Antichrist in a single woman’s dream. This is evidence of her being tainted by evil eyes or envy, and she must be closer to God Almighty. Moreover, if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she has married someone The Antichrist. This indicates the interpretation that cannot be predicted and that he will be exposed to a certain temptation and submit to it until he surrenders and the consequences will be dire. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a man chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an injured eye, such as an eye injury in a dream, is one of the visions that worries many people. It carries these interpretations and interpretations that differ based on the details and scenes of the dream, and in this context we will learn about them. The interpretation of a dream about an injured eye is also: In the event that a married woman sees in a dream that her eye is missing or inflamed. This vision is evidence of the loss of someone she loves, whether it is her son or Her husband or one of her parents. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that her eye has been infected. This indicates that problems will arise for her and she will be tired in life. Likewise, if a married woman sees in a dream that her eye is full of worms and she wants to remove them,

title: Interpretation of a dream about linen: seeing linen in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about linen clothesInterpretation of a dream about linenInterpretation of a dream about linenIf you see linen in your dreams, this portends success and pleasure. If someone appears to you wearing linen clothes, you will soon receive good news in the form of an inheritance. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing a linen shirt, he will obtain an honest, legitimate livelihood, saving money from it. Ibn Sirin interpreted his dream about dreaming about linen: ** Linen is money. Al-Nabulsi interpreted His dream of dreaming of linen: ** Whoever dreams that he is wearing a linen shirt will obtain a legitimate living from it and save money from it. As Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of dreaming of linen: * He interprets legitimate money as long as he sees it, and it is inferior in terms of expression to cotton, and seeing white linen is pure white. Better than yellow, long is better than short. As for seeing what the linen of the clothes is made of, its expression is also displayed in its rightful place in the clothing and apparel section. As for seeing the furniture he uses, its interpretation is in place, and as for spinning, spinning, and weaving, their interpretation is coming. If you see linen threads in a dream, this predicts profitable projects. Seeing a belt of linen, cloth, silk, or wool in a dream is a sign of money, but movable money such as bonds and stocks And other money in the form of bank notes, seeing it in a dream is a sign of the good mood of the person who sees this money. Interpretation of seeing linen in a dream - YouTube

title: The most important signs of seeing a gecko in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: Seeing geckos in a single woman's dream, the gecko is a reptile that can cause panic and fear in some people, but seeing a gecko in a dream for the dreamer, is it good or is there another food that the girl should pay attention to? We will explain this in the following lines, read with us to know everything new. Seeing geckos in a single woman's dream Seeing a gecko in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she is under the control of magic and must be patient and patient until her master saves her from danger. Watching the killing of a gecko in a dream for a girl leads to her victory over enemies and bad friends and getting rid of them to live in peace and stability. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a gecko in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is following in the footsteps of Satan and charlatans until she reaches her dreams, but in dishonest ways, so she must wake up from her negligence so that she does not do so. Falling into the abyss, and fear of geckos in a dream for a girl indicates constant anxiety and tension from an unknown future, due to her delayed marriage and the old age of her uncle. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a girl leads to diseases that she will suffer from due to neglecting her health and proper diet, and she must be careful not to suffer from a malaise that leads to her being admitted to the hospital. A wise and wise man. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a single woman Sadiq Imam believes that seeing a gecko in a dream for an unmarried woman means bad news that will reach her and may be her failure in her academic stage as a result of her inability to receive lessons continuously. Be careful and do not trust everyone. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a girl means the presence of a deceitful man trying to infiltrate her life with the intention of harming her, so she must preserve herself and not be carried away by emotions and feelings so as not to sigh. After a heavy loss, he will suffer and be free from worries. Seeing geckos in a dream for a single woman from Al-Nabulsi Seeing a belly in a dream for an unmarried woman in Al-Nabulsi means that there are haters and hypocrites around her who deceive her and envy her for the success and excellence she has achieved in a short time. And in the wrong way, she should not be confined to things that do not benefit her. Seeing a swarm in a dream for a girl indicates that a person is asking for her hand and she must think carefully before making fatal decisions so as not to fall into sadness and distress throughout her life, and killing the swarm in the dreamer's dream indicates that her Lord has accepted her repentance after she refrained from doing what is contrary to Sharia and religion. Killing a gecko in a dream Seeing the killing of a stomach in a dream for the dreamer indicates his strong personality and his ability to overcome hardships and crises skillfully and without loss. Seeing the killing of a swarm in a dream means that he will find a suitable job opportunity that will improve his material and moral income for the better, and killing the bite in the dreamer's sleep indicates his imminent marriage to a girl with good morals and religion and I will live with her with tenderness and love. Seeing a belly in a dream for an unmarried woman in Nabulsi means that there are haters and hypocrites around her who deceive her and envy her for the success and superiority she has achieved in a short time. In a wrong way, she should not limit herself to things that do not benefit her. Seeing a swarm in a dream for a girl indicates that the person is asking for her hand, and she must think carefully before making fatal decisions so that she does not fall into sadness and anguish throughout her life. Killing the swarm in the dreamer’s dream indicates that her Lord will accept her repentance. After refraining from doing what is contrary to Sharia and religion. Killing a gecko in a dream. Seeing killing the stomach in a dream for the dreamer indicates his strong personality and his ability to overcome adversity and crises skillfully and without loss. Seeing killing a flock in a dream means that he will find a suitable job opportunity that will improve his material and moral income for the better. Killing the sting in the dreamer’s sleep indicates his close marriage to a girl with good morals and religion, and I will live with her with tenderness and love. Interpretation of a dream about a white gecko.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: There are many who fear death even if it comes in a dream, or it is just a fleeting dream, and then we find many questions and inquiries about seeing death in a dream, and interpretations may differ from one person to another depending on the nature. About the dream and the nature of the seer, so they stayed with us to get to know him. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentions in his interpretations that if a person sees in a dream that there is a dead person known to him in the form of the living. And he begins to talk to the dreamer and tells him that he is alive and not dead. It may be An indication of the status of the deceased and his position in Paradise because it shows his comfort and enjoyment in the afterlife. Ibn Sirin explains that if one sees in a dream that the dead person is speaking to him. In reality, when you hear something from him, you tell him the truth about him. Also, the dead person is in the abode of truth and his statement cannot be A lie. When a person sees in a dream that a dead person is talking to him, this is evidence of good news and also indicates good news about the dreamer’s long life. Ibn Sirin explains that when a person sees in a dream that he is talking to the dead. It may be an indication of learning from the dead and it may It indicates that the fortuneteller was negligent in his life. It also indicates the spiritual bond that connects the fortuneteller with the dead person after his departure. Ibn Sirin explained that when a person sees in a dream that he is sitting with the dead person and talking to him. This may indicate a case where the fortuneteller misses the deceased, which prompts him to... Remember those days when he was connected to the dead person. Ibn Sirin explains that when a person sees that the dead person is talking to him about a message that he conveys to him in his dream, it is as if he is asking him to commit to doing something. It indicates that it is a trust that must be preserved and delivered to its rightful place. See also : Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the dead in a dream and talking to him by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained in his interpretations that whoever sees the dead in a dream talks to him. This may indicate the high status of the deceased in Paradise, as well as the great goodness of the dreamer and his long life. Ibn Sirin explains If he sees a dead person in a dream, he tells him that he is still alive. This may explain the lofty and elevated status of the dead person before his Lord in the Gardens of Bliss. When someone sees in a dream that the dead person is talking to him and asking him for something to eat, this may indicate that the deceased is in need of alms or begging. Who had the vision? Ibn Sirin claims that if a person sees in a dream that a dead person is speaking to him, but he becomes angry and blames him. This could be a warning sign against committing sins and disobedience, so let him take the initiative in repenting and seeking forgiveness. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dreamIf someone sees in Dreaming that the deceased is still alive in the dream, this may indicate ease in the dreamer’s condition. It also shows that he may be able to meet his needs without difficulty. When a person sees in a dream that there are many dead people known to him. Somewhere, they were They are dressed well and appear to be happy and content. This may indicate that there are things that bring goodness and joy to the dreamer, and this also indicates the transition of these people.

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a cave in a dream and its most important indicators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cave in a dream: The events that a person sees in his dream can be closely related to the events of waking life, which you must closely relate to, this is how dream interpretations are received in a correct way and help you understand the evidence, for this reason we will be with you to clarify And the explanation: The dream of seeing a cave in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a cave in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a cave in a dream, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, is one of the visions that does not bode well and can alert the dreamer that his condition will change for the worse. The following will specifically explain to you the interpretation of seeing a cave in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A cave in a dream means distress, as well as a lot of worries. Also, seeing a cave in a dream means a short life. It also means lack of blessings of money and body. Also, a cave in a dream can indicate To a bad person. Or it indicates that the dreamer feels that he is not being exploited by this person. The cave in the dream indicates that the dreamer is being deceived and deceived. The water in the cave may be an indication of the deteriorating health condition of this dreamer, and God knows best. As senior scholars say The interpretation is that the cave means a deterioration in the dreamer’s situation. The situation changes from rich to poor. From spacious to narrow. The cave in the dream indicates that the dreamer may lose his job. It also means some problems that the dreamer suffers from. Difficulty in finding solutions. But when the dreamer enters the cave to worship This indicates his repentance and closeness to God and his righteousness. A bright cave in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the problems and crises that he is suffering from. While a dark cave means many sorrows and worries and can also mean the grave. Seeing fire in the cave warns the dreamer of many temptations. And sins. If you see burning in the cave, this means damage and misfortunes will befall the fortuneteller. The cave, while he sees it in a dream in the middle of the sea, is a sign of the temptation to which the viewer is exposed. If the cave is filled with people, this indicates the spread of poverty among the people and means the spread of high prices. See Also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bird cage in a dream Interpretation of leaving the cave in a dream This vision has many meanings that are dear to the dreamer and means the good that will happen to the dreamer in his life, and perhaps this good will affect his family as well, and the following is everything related to the interpretation of leaving the cave in a dream by the scholar Ibn Sirin: Seeing yourself emerging from a cave in a dream indicates news coming from a fortune teller. It also indicates that the dreamer has been liberated from the problems and fears that he has been suffering from for a long time. Perhaps exiting the cave means that the dreamer will return to something he left behind. If she is seen emerging from The cave is accompanied by one of the parents, this indicates their recovery and recovery. If the husband is accompanied by the husband, this means removing problems between the spouses. It means love between them. If the dreamer leaves the cave accompanied by children, this means his future full of success and progress. This also means that the dreamer has a degree High level of innovation and creativity. If a person sees in a dream that he is crawling out of a cave, this means...

title: Interpretation of seeing dolphins in a dream in detail

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a dolphin fish in a dream in detail. The dolphin is a marine creature and is beloved. It is one of the fish that people resort to and can be treated. In this article, we will provide you with all possible interpretations of seeing a dolphin in a dream. Seeing a dolphin by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a dolphin in a dream is permissible food, and it may be a sign of winter huts or raindrops. There are those who interpreted seeing a dolphin in a dream, in relation to an opponent who encroaches on Affairs and interests of the dreamer. To see a dolphin in a dream. Interpretation experts interpreted that seeing a dolphin in a dream could be a sign of entering a new phase, worse than the one it was in. There are those who interpreted seeing a dolphin in a dream as indicating the commission of conspiracies against the dreamer. The vision indicates A dolphin in a dream or a dolphin refers to a powerful person who has a high status and status and a large body who is not satisfied with a certain gift. Interpretation of seeing a dolphin in a dream Seeing the meat of a dolphin or a dolphin, or its bone or skin in a dream, indicates obtaining abundant food and halal money. Whoever sees a dolphin in a dream has A son wants to marry him, so this is a sign and a signal to check her and choose the right husband for her. Watch a dolphin swimming in the water. Who sees a dolphin in a dream? Swimming in calm waters. This dream is a good omen for the dreamer. It can be a sign of receiving good news and getting some positive change in one’s life. The dreamer, on both the personal and social levels. Seeing a dolphin in a dream is a sign of happiness, love, friendship, and loyalty between the dreamer and his relatives and friends. Who sees a dolphin? Swimming in stormy waters, which is evidence that he has entered a phase dominated by problems and difficulties that force him to solve and study them so that they do not escalate, and it may be The dream is a sign of falling into a tight financial crisis, but it will quickly disappear. Interpretation of seeing a dolphin in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a dolphin in a dream indicates great love and it may be a sign that you are marrying someone you know who has bound you with great love. Seeing a dolphin in a dream for a pregnant womanPregnant woman Whoever sees one or two dolphins swimming in the water, this dream is good for her and her fetus in good health. Therefore, we present to you all possible interpretations of seeing a dolphin in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the explanation as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fingerprint in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Fingerprint recognition refers to a mechanism for verifying the compatibility of two human fingerprints, and a fingerprint is one of the types of biometrics used to verify and record identities. Today we will show you seeing a fingerprint in a dream. According to leading translators and scholars, what are the signs of this vision. The fingerprint in a dream indicates the completion of the matter and the achievement of the goal, and the fingerprint indicates the five daily prayers, as well as testimony of honesty and hard work. The fingerprint indicates the fulfillment of desires, the marriage of the girl, and the acquisition of a prominent position for the young man. Interpretation of dreams about the fingerprint by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream about seeing fingers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Ibn Sirin explained when he saw the fingerprint why he made the dreamer do a lot of work. This also indicates that the dreamer worked hard and maintained his own efforts. Seeing a fingerprint in a dream means that testimony is required in a particular case. The fingerprint also indicates that the matter has been completed. Read Also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off fingers in a dream by Al-Nabulsi in detail. Interpretation of a better vision of fingers. Seeing fingers in dreams refers to children and parents. Seeing fingers in a dream also symbolizes money or royalty. Seeing fingerprints in a dream indicates an increase in money and status. Seeing your thumb in a dream means supplication For dawn. As for seeing the index, seeing the middle, it means the afternoon prayer. See also the ring of the sunset prayer. Seeing that the fingers of the hand have grown in a dream indicates an increase in prayer or knowledge. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a broken arm in a dream. Interpretation of a fingerprint in a dream for a single or married girl. And pregnant women. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is waiting for her mark, the dream said that she will get married soon. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marking something, the subject indicates that her husband will make a profitable deal, which can make a lot of money. When a pregnant woman sees Imprinted in a dream, the dream indicates that the pregnant woman and the fetus are in good health and there is no problem with the pregnancy. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fingerprint in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Some interpretations of a fingerprint in a dream. If a person sees his thumb in a dream, this means that he should pray the dawn prayer and memorize it. When the left thumb appears in the dreamer’s dream, this is an expression of the dreamer’s daughter or sister. When a person sees five fingers on his hand in a dream, it clearly expresses the five daily prayers. Seeing a brand name in a dream can be an expression of the fulfillment of a desire. Seeing A fingerprint in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve what he wants. Interpretation of a dream about signing a paper. Seeing a signature in a dream means fulfilling desires. A single girl says that she has obtained a university degree. And if she sees that she has concluded a marriage contract or passed papers, this indicates her marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a handprint. Fingerprint It indicates the completion of things, the satisfaction of desires, and the building of a future for unmarried young people. It can also indicate to the young man that his marriage and building a family is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about a seal on papers: The appearance of a seal on papers indicates projects and work.
